details.spack_dependencies: ^intel-mpi@2019.10.317/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' intel-mpi@2019.10.317 % ${SPACK_COMPILER}) ^cuda@11.2.2/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' cuda@11.2.2 % ${SPACK_COMPILER}) ^python@3.8.12/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' python@3.8.12 % ${SPACK_COMPILER})
details.spack_spec: charmpp@6.10.2 % gcc@8.5.0 backend=mpi build-target=charm++ +cuda ~omp ~papi pmi=none +production ~pthreads +shared +smp ~syncft ~tcp ~tracing ^intel-mpi@2019.10.317/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' intel-mpi@2019.10.317 % gcc@8.5.0) ^cuda@11.2.2/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' cuda@11.2.2 % gcc@8.5.0) ^python@3.8.12/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' python@3.8.12 % gcc@8.5.0)
